statements: DELETE FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND irrigation_status = 'active';
DELETE FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE id = 100 AND sensor_id = 1
DELETE FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE water_pressure > 10 AND sensor_location = 'Garden'
DELETE FROM water_usage WHERE crop_id = 5 AND amount < 100.0;
DELETE FROM irrigation_system WHERE status = 'active' AND location LIKE '%garden%';
DELETE FROM water_sources WHERE id = 1 AND capacity >= 1000.5
DELETE FROM WaterUsage WHERE id = 5 AND water_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM CropManagement WHERE growth_stage = 'Mature' AND planting_date < '2022-01-01';
